00009 ;   Abstract:
00010 ;
00011 ;       This module contains the assembly structures and definitions
00012 ;       for INTEL 80x86 CPU specifiec information.  This include file
00013 ;       is mainly used by CPU.ASM to determine CPU type and stepping
00014 ;       number.

00025 ; The following equates define the control bits of CR0 register
00026 ;
00027 
00028 CR0_AM          equ     40000h
00029 CR0_ET          equ     00010h
00030 
00031 ;
00032 ; The following equates define the control bits of EFALGS register
00033 ;
00034 
00035 EFLAGS_AC       equ     40000h
00036 EFLAGS_VM       equ     20000h
00037 EFLAGS_RF       equ     10000h
00038 EFLAGS_NF       equ     4000h
00039 EFLAGS_IOPL     equ     3000h
00040 EFLAGS_IF       equ     200h
00041 EFLAGS_TF       equ     100h
